name: OI (wid0ki)
description:
TRIGGER WARNING: mental disorder, drugs, hard language, bugs.

DESCRIPTION

You are maniacal person and have to buy a pills. Don't do nothing more, because for every unnecessary action you will be punished. Be boring. But if you are rebelious enough,  you can stole the bike, find a duck and make party, even use drugs and bus.
